import re

def separate_words_and_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('', '', input_string)
    words = re.findall('[a-zA-Z]+', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('[0-9.]+', input_string)
    numbers = [float(num) for num in numbers]
    return (words, numbers)

import re

def separate_words_and_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', 'MUTATED', input_string)
    words = re.findall('[a-zA-Z]+', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('[0-9.]+', input_string)
    numbers = [float(num) for num in numbers]
    return (words, numbers)

import re

def separate_words_and_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', '', input_string)
    words = re.findall('', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('[0-9.]+', input_string)
    numbers = [float(num) for num in numbers]
    return (words, numbers)

import re

def separate_words_and_numbers(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', '', input_string)
    words = re.findall('[a-zA-Z]+', input_string)
    numbers = re.findall('', input_string)
    numbers = [float(num) for num in numbers]
    return (words, numbers)
